about._meta_title: Create the app for your business
about._meta_description: Do apps yourself, for your business. It is easy, without coding, and quick, in few minutes.
about._keywords: create app, how to create your app, create app android, create app iphone, create application, create online app, crear mobile app

paragraphs: Upplication is a Madrid based tech company specializing in the simplification of app creation.

Our platform was launched in beta phase in October 2013 as an app builder. The key to this technology is the dashboard, simple yet sophisticated, creation and management is made easy through innovative technology. Businesses have the luxury of creating mobile apps in minutes without the complications of coding. Upplication eliminates the long processes and high costs associated with app creation, and adds the benefit of do-it-yourself app management.

The key to this technology is the dashboard, simple yet sophisticated, creation and management is made easy through innovative technology. Upplication lets businesses of all types sell their valuable products on mobile devices in the App Store and Google Play.
Emphasizing on simplicity, Upplication is redefining app creation. Join our revolution with over 10,000 other successful businesses in mobile marketing success.

offer._meta_title: Crea tu propia app móvil online. Prueba GRATIS durante 15 días, sin necesidad de programación. - Upplication
offer._meta_description: Upplication® Crear app, tu propia app móvil online. Prueba GRATIS durante 15 días, sin necesidad de programación en cuestión de minutos. Tu app para Android e iOS
offer._keywords: crear app, como crear tu app, crear app android, crear app iphone, crear aplicacion, crear app online, crear app movil
introduction: En Upplication somos un equipo en continuo aprendizaje donde existe un flujo de información entre todo el equipo, donde cualquier idea es revisada y discutida para que nos aseguremos que cada proceso y decisión que hemos tomado sea óptimo.

Queremos seguir renovando nuestras ideas y por ello buscamos un compañero de trabajo en prácticas que entre a formar parte de nuestro equipo de desarrollo y nos ayude a desarrollar nuestro dashboard y CRM interno.

Queremos ofrecer una buena experiencia de prácticas donde se aprenda y se disponga de la oportunidad de entrar en el mercado laboral. No creemos en unas prácticas donde, aunque el trabajador demuestre su valía, no se da la oportunidad de entrar a formar parte de la empresa. ¡Es que es de cajón! si una persona es buena, en una empresa que está creciendo, sería un problema no intentar que se quede con nosotros.

technologies.intro: Dentro de nuestras prácticas, buscamos un desarrollador con conocimientos de las siguientes tecnologías.
list: Java
SQL
Html y Javascript
Conocimientos de algún framework MVC. (Spring MVC, por ejemplo)
Conocimientos de Java EE 6
technologies.note: No buscamos un experto, para eso están estas prácticas, pero si buscamos personas con motivación e iniciativa, que quiera trabajar por algo más que un simple sueldo. Por hacer algo grande y bueno.

offer.lifestyle: Si quieres ganarte la vida como desarrollador y te gustan las tecnologías móviles, nos gustaría que nos conociéramos y habláramos sobre el proyecto y nuestra forma de entender el trabajo. Si vemos que todo cuadra, haremos todo lo posible para que estés en nuestro equipo.

list: Prácticas de 3 o 4 meses con posibilidad de entrar en plantilla.
Horario flexible
No un simple tutor, toda un equipo de trabajo siempre dispuesto a resolver tus dudas :)
Formar parte del desarrollo de un proyecto vivo, tu código lo utilizarán miles de personas.
Espacio de trabajo cómodo y amplio con un buen equipo y 2 monitores de 22 pulgadas para que trabajes bien a gusto.
Zona de relax con sus sofas y puffs, máquina de cafés, nevera, microondas, unas vistas increíbles de Madrid, trabajar en la Gran Vía... La verdad es que Wayra (nuestra incubadora) mola bastante
Unos 100 € para que, por lo menos, no te cueste dinero venir a Upplication.

offer.wewanttomeetyou: Para que podamos conocerte envíanos un correo a javier.arnaiz@upplication.com con tu CV y una breve introducción sobre ti, tu trabajo y lo que puedes aportar a Upplication. Prometemos contestar, sí o sí.

offer_marketing._meta_title: Crea tu propia app móvil online. Prueba GRATIS durante 15 días, sin necesidad de programación. - Upplication
offer_marketing._meta_description: Upplication® Crear app, tu propia app móvil online. Prueba GRATIS durante 15 días, sin necesidad de programación en cuestión de minutos. Tu app para Android e iOS
offer_marketing._keywords: crear app, como crear tu app, crear app android, crear app iphone, crear aplicacion, crear app online, crear app movil
introduction: Upplication es una herramienta que permite a cualquier pyme crearse una app en pocos pasos, sin necesidad de conocimientos técnicos ni llamar a nadie, y por un precio que se adapta a su capacidad de inversión (desde 5€/mes).
Actualmente tenemos presencia en 46 países y hemos creado más de 10.000 apps en los 10 meses que llevamos en el mercado.

technologies.intro: Buscamos un becario para el departamento de Marketing de Contenidos que cumpla con los siguientes requisitos:
list: Buscamos Titulados universitarios o universitarios en últimos cursos con gran pasión por marketing.
Buen manejo de herramientas de edición y diseño.
Gran capacidad de redacción.
Interesado en los sectores del Marketing Digital y el Ecommerce.
Preferiblemente persona con conocimientos de periodismo o experiencia en redacción de contenidos.
Persona proactiva, con iniciativa e implicación con la empresa y los distintos proyectos.
Persona Organizada (orientada al detalle).
Gran capacidad de trabajo y ambición, buscamos a un joven profesional que tome el proyecto Upplication como propio.
technologies.note: No buscamos un experto, para eso están estas prácticas, pero si buscamos personas con motivación e iniciativa, que quiera trabajar por algo más que un simple sueldo. Por hacer algo grande y bueno.

offer_marketing.lifestyle: Si quieres ganarte la vida como desarrollador y te gustan las tecnologías móviles, nos gustaría que nos conociéramos y habláramos sobre el proyecto y nuestra forma de entender el trabajo. Si vemos que todo cuadra, haremos todo lo posible para que estés en nuestro equipo.

list: Ayuda en la creación de apps para clientes.
Apoyo en el desarrollo de diferentes proyectos de marketing.
Apoyo a otros departamentos (Social Media, Ecommerce, Comercial, etc).
Dada la implicación directa del becario con el departamento comercial, se entregará una remuneración variable en función de resultados.

offer_marketing.wewanttomeetyou: Para que podamos conocerte envíanos un correo a hello@upplication.com con tu CV y una breve introducción sobre ti, tu trabajo y lo que puedes aportar a Upplication. Prometemos contestar, sí o sí.

terms.title: Terms of Service

legal.title: Legal Warning
paragraphs: In compliance with the duty of disclosure contained in Article 10 of Law 34/2002 of July 11, of the Servicios de la Sociedad de la Información y de Comercio Electrónico (Information and E-commerce Society Services), we inform you that the URL www.upplication.com (hereinafter the PORTAL/WEBSITE) is a domain owned by UPPLICATION SOFTWARE TECHNOLOGIES, S.L. (hereinafter the COMPANY) established in Glorieta Quevedo 7, 4º Izquieda, 28015 (Madrid).

All trademarks, trade names or distinctive signs of any kind that appear on the site are owned by the company or third parties, and it is understood that the use or access to the Site and/or services give the user no rights on the trademarks, trade names and/or distinctive signs.

Furthermore, all content published on the web, its graphic design, images, database, and source code are property of the company or third parties, not transferring to the user, under the provisions of this Legal Notice, any rights that exist or may exist in such content beyond what is considered to be necessary for the proper use of the site and the services provided through it.
The access to this website is the sole responsibility of the user. Simple access to the portal does not imply any commercial relationship between the company and the user.
By accessing to the website, the user accepts the terms and conditions described on the web portal/site.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
paragraphs: This policy applies to the www.upplication.com website (hereinafter, the PORTAL/SITE) and all services and products offered online/on the internet by UPPLICATION SOFTWARE TECHNOLOGIES, SL (hereinafter the COMPANY/ENTITY). This document outlines the type of personal information that the company/entity receives and collects when using the services of our web page.

The use of cookies, logs, links and other technologies are expected to be used to store the preferences of the user, in order to improve the quality of our services, ensure the technical functioning of the network, and develop new and better features. If cookies are disabled or rejected, some of the functions and/or services of the portal may not function properly.

In compliance with Article 5 of the 15/1999 Organic law, December 13th, regarding the Protection of Personal Data, which regulates the right of information in data gathering, we inform you that your personal data will be incorporated into a Personal Data File, owned by UPPLICATION SOFTWARE TECHNOLOGIES, S.L. as Responsible for the file, in order to maintain our contractual, commercial and professional relationship that link us to you, and also to send postal communications, telematics, or through other means, for specific events and occasions, or at certain times of the year, which may be of interest for the individual concerned.

In addition, UPPLICATION SOFTWARE TECHNOLOGIES, S.L. guarantees the data owner the exercises of the rights of access, rectification, cancellation and opposition regarding their data, by written notice addressed to the following address:  Glorieta Quevedo 7,  4º Izquieda, 28015 (Madrid).

In any case, the data owner is informed and consents to the storage of such data under the rightful safety conditions and professional confidentiality, for the period that is necessary for the purpose for which they are collected.

The SITE/PORTAL has no control over the websites displayed as a result of your search, links or accesses made from our directory. These other websites may place their own cookies or ask for your personal information.

The COMPANY informs its registered users of the possibility to exercise their rights of access, cancellation, rectification and opposition regarding their personal data contained in the files of the COMPANY by written notice, along with a photocopy of the ID, and addressing it to UPPLICATION SOFTWARE TECHNOLOGIES, S.L. , to the following address : Glorieta Quevedo 7,  4º Izquieda, 28015 (Madrid).

These files are duly registered in the Registro de la Agencia Española de Protección de Datos (Spanish Agency for Data Protection)  and meet the Safety Measures required by the Real Decreto (Royal Legislative Decree) 1720/2007.
The concerned users are only allowed to use the PORTAL upon acceptance and compliance with the conditions set here, having to leave the site otherwise.

subsections.title: 1. IDENTIFICATION OF THE PARTIES.
paragraphs: The General Conditions of Use of the services offered in the URL www.upplication.com (hereinafter, the PORTAL/WEBSITE) are signed by the holder of the domain, UPPLICATION SOFTWARE TECHNOLOGIES, S.L., whose contact email is : hello@upplication.com
We understand by USER : any individual that has the ability of effectively signing/suscribing a contract according to the applicable law.
You may not use the website and may not accept the Terms if :
You are not of legal age and cannot form a binding contract according to the law, or
You cannot be considered a USER as described above.

subsections.title: 2. IMPROVEMENT OF AGREEMENT.
paragraphs: In order to use the PORTAL, you must accept these terms and conditions (hereinafter Terms and Conditions), as well as those specific stipulations collected for the use and/or contracting of specific services.
Otherwise, you must abandon the PORTAL.
You can accept the Terms by :
clicking on the “Accept” button of the Terms, when you are offered this option on the user interface, or
using the website effectively. You acknowledge and accept that the use of the PORTAL is considered as the acceptance of the Terms.
The USER is advised to read carefully these terms. You can save or print them if you wish.

subsections.title: 3. SCOPE OF APPLICATION.
paragraphs: These general conditions shall apply to all services/products listed on the website :
www.upplication.com

subsections.title: HOW AND WHY DO WE USE COOKIES?:
paragraphs: UPPLICATION SOFTWARE TECHNOLOGIES S.L.  (UPPLICATION) uses cookies on its websites (upplication.com, and any other sub-domain owned) to provide the most effective website to our customers. Among other things, Cookies allow us to remember the preferences and the use of specific tools and sections of our website. This Cookies Policy Section explains what Cookies are, how we use them, and how you will benefit from them. As you may know, a recent legislation requires that websites obtain consent from visitors in order to use certain cookies.

UPPLICATION uses cookies in order to measure the behavior of the user both on our website (www.upplication.com) and any other sub-domain, as mentioned above. Through analytics, we are able to optimize our users experience within the tool.

The Date is obtained through Google Analytics software. This software treats the obtained data and only UPPLICATION can access it. This data is confidential and will never be sold to another company. It will only be treated internally and will be monitored under the safety standards established by the law.

subsections.title: MANAGING YOUR BROWSER’S COOKIES
paragraphs: Most browsers on computers, smartphones, and other devices are enabled to accept cookies. If you wish to change your Cookie Preferences on this website, or any other website, you may access this in your browser settings. The “Help” feature of your browser will tell you how. We remind you that if you choose to block the use of certain cookies on our website, it may interfere with with its functionality.

Whenever you visit one of our websites, the local jurisdictions require us to ask for your consent to set cookies on your device. We will always ask you before setting up a cookie with a banner on the bottom of the screen, which will disappear within 7 seconds after its appearance. After that time has elapsed, you will automatically be accepting cookies on your device.
